metadata.title: Berlin District BBQ Restrictions
metadata.description: District-wide grilling prohibition areas in Berlin

properties.name: Treptow-Köpenick
properties.title: No BBQ Areas Available
properties.description: This entire district has no designated public grilling areas. BBQ is prohibited in all public spaces.
properties.details: Despite being Berlin's largest district with extensive green spaces, Treptow-Köpenick does not permit public grilling due to fire safety regulations and nature conservation efforts.
properties.alternative_suggestion: Consider nearby districts like Neukölln (Tempelhofer Feld) or Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg (Görlitzer Park) for legal grilling options.
